abstract: Think Quarterly, a business-to-business marketing tool from Google, will make its debut this week. But it’s being promoted with a retro technique: snail mail.
snippet: Think Quarterly, a business-to-business marketing tool from Google, will make its debut this week. But it’s being promoted with a retro technique: snail mail.
lead_paragraph: “DATA beats opinion” has long been a mantra at Google, where evidence-based research tends to rule. But now the company is showing its softer side with Think Quarterly, a business-to-business publication whose first United States issue is to make its debut online this week.

headline.main: Slowing Down to Savor the Data
headline.print_headline: Slowing Down To Savor the Data
